name: Forge Direct
tagline: Everything you need, at a price you can afford!
description:
At Forge Direct, you won't find any ninjas, magicians, alchemists, or other catchy titles. You won't find 2 wild & crazy guys. Our office is not filled with college kids hopped up on energy drinks, part-time tattoo artists, or the crazy goatee guy that tries to convert everyone to a Mac. But, you will find experienced, seasoned, creative professionals that are ready and willing to help you solve unique marketing, advertising, and communication objectives.
We approach each project with an open mind and a real eagerness to help. Our creative is just that – creative. We’re well versed in most of the known and some not so well known marketing tactics. We are designers, artists, writers, detailed planners, and savvy marketing consultants, but most of all, we are problem solvers. In fact, we often solve problems you didn't even know you had.
